title: A request about Arcade Riven from a fighting game fanboy
body:
Make Arcade Riven's kills and deaths make the "KO!" effect, even if only she can see and hear them. In fact, feel free to apply that to every suggestion in this post. My inner fighting game fanboy wants to feel like I'm fighting for rounds in a fighting game when I walk into lane.

Also if you could move the "HIT!" effect from her Q hits to successful passive strikes, that would be awesome, both thematically and as a practical purpose: New Riven players can use that effect to better learn how to frame cancel. You could even keep the Q "Hit!" but have the passive strikes "HIT!" a different color, like red or bright blue. 

Lastly, add a combo counter above Riven's head. Just something that keeps track of the number of abilities and auto attacks she lands on a enemy in a single continuous attack string. This would also be incredible to see.

Please, this is a humble request from a fighting game player that would love to feel some love toward the fighting game community.
